definitions: in a way that promotes or indicates good health

examples.text: a national campaign encouraging people to eat healthily
your body absorbs and uses the fat you need to function healthily

shortDefinitions: in way that promotes or indicates good health

definitions: in a normal, natural, and desirable manner

examples.text: a healthily skeptical view of today's journalism
an earnest and healthily ambitious young newshound

shortDefinitions: in normal, natural, and desirable manner

examples.text: the company's profit has increased healthily
